about_the_game:
This is the demo for FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT!

Enjoy the first chapter of ADVENTURE MODE and play local 1v1 TOMATO FIGHTERS minigame with your friends.
detailed_description:
This is the demo for FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT!

Enjoy the first chapter of ADVENTURE MODE and play local 1v1 TOMATO FIGHTERS minigame with your friends.
name: FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT Demo
short_description: Change between three seasons on a strange archipelago to solve puzzles, quiet-quit your forklift job, and dismantle the potato-dominated shipping industry. When you're done exploring, kick back and play a deckbuilding card game in a wild attempt to dethrone your local Gods.
